roleset.name: impel action

example.name: all args
example.text: Jamaica, wary of upsetting its Caribbean Basin allies, has apparently instructed its lobbyist to abandon the provision initially drafted by Mr. Gray, but the greater question is whether Mr. Inouye, who has strong ties to the sugar industry, is able to insert a claim by the Philippines.
example.arg: Jamaica, wary of upsetting its Caribbean Basin allies
to abandon the provision initially drafted by Mr. Gray

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet. Member of Vncls advise-37.9-1.
